text: 2.19 Epe 2.21, 4.15-16 Bɨ anɨb ak, Klays nop chɨg tep ma gɨl, nop kelɨgup. Pen Klays, ne kɨmɨg won tek ak mɨdeb, chɨn wak ñɨn kɨd tob kɨd ne tek mɨdobun. Ne chɨnop gek, chɨn nop chɨgɨl, bɨ kɨdɨl tek jɨmñɨl mubwak nokom mɨdobun. Anɨgɨl mɨdon, God chɨnop gek wog gon amek nɨm, mɨdtep gɨnɨgabun, Klays mubwak ne awl gɨl kɨles gɨnɨgab.
